name: Arrow Shirts
describe: Arrow is one of the oldest brands when it comes to men's shirts and is owned by the PVH Company

name: Peter England Shirts
describe: Peter England is one of the largest menswear brands in India known for its standardized fits, fashionable styles and superior quality. Peter England’s shirts are a blend of comfort and style that makes it a top men’s shirt brand.

name: Levi’s
describe: Levi’s is one of the most popular and top-selling jeans brand in the world. This veteran jeans brand has been able to create a distinctive place of its own in the merchandise industry as people associate it with a definite status symbol.

name: Wrangler
describe: Wrangler is often described as a cool jeans brand because of superb fitting and stylish looks. It is designed by integrating both modern trends and vintage fashion. The in-demand jeans brand carries a “W” signature on its back pocket that gives it an individual, original and classy look.
